title: Private club 1880 Singapore closes down, says it has no funds to pay staff and suppliers

content.author: N/A
content.description: The private members' club in Robertson Quay said spending and visits by its members have been "trending down".
content.full_content_snippet:
SINGAPORE: Private members' club 1880 Singapore has informed members it will close permanently on Tuesday (Jun 17) and enter liquidation.
